column2: For tobacco products that are burned, such as cigarettes, cigars, pipes, or hookah, which statement best describes the rules about smoking a tobacco product inside your home?
column17: 1 = It is not allowed anywhere or at any time inside my home
column18: 2 = It is allowed in some places or at some times inside my home
column19: 3 = It is allowed anywhere and at anytime inside my home

column2: Now think about other tobacco products that are not burned, like smokeless tobacco, dissolvable tobacco, and electronic cigarettes. Which statement best describes the rules about using these products inside your home?
column17: 1 = It is not allowed anywhere or at any time inside my home
column18: 2 = It is allowed in some places or at some times inside my home
column19: 3 = It is allowed anywhere and at anytime inside my home
